ai.summary: An easy 4.9 km loop through UK countryside suitable for families and casual walkers. The route offers gentle scenery, easy footing, and minimal elevation gain, making it a relaxing day out.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly grassy paths and compact gravel tracks with occasional muddy patches after rain. The route may include rural lanes and hedgerows; be prepared for slippery ground when wet and some uneven sections near gates.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and appropriate clothing. Check the weather before you go and carry a light rain layer. Stay on marked paths and be mindful of other users, including horses on bridleways. Keep dogs under control and away from livestock. Bring water, a small first aid kit, and a charged mobile phone. Take care at road crossings and in poor visibility.
ai.best_seasons: Year round, with the best conditions from late spring to early autumn. Winter visits can be wetter and muddier, with shorter daylight hours.
